# Restaurant Website Template - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Reusable single-restaurant website template using Next.js (App Router) and Tailwind CSS.

## Key Principles
- All restaurant content comes from site.config.ts
- No hardcoded data in components
- Components must be fully reusable
- Easy to rebrand by editing config only
